sources.title: Hell's Garden (2021)
sources.description: Tanaka Naoko is a 26-year-old OL; office lady. Her job is typical, but her workplace has fierce fights among different cliques. Other OLs are absorbed in the daily clique fighting. One day, due to an OL at the company, Tanaka Naoko's company is targeted by OL from all over Japan. (Source: AsianWiki)

metadata.Plot: Naoko Tanaka is a 26-year-old office lady. Her job is typical, but her workplace has fierce fights among different cliques. Other office ladies are absorbed in the daily clique fighting. One day, due to an office lady at the company, Naoko's company is targeted by office lady from all over Japan.
